website_summaries.verdict: Well designed makeup bags at a surprisingly low price point.
pros: Reusable canvas makeup bags available in multiple color combinations
Perfect for housing cosmetic party favors
cons: If you choose pink, the bags are not the same shade as the picture – more of a bubblegum pink

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with these bags and the quality is really nice! I can’t wait to give these to my bridesmaids. This was only a 6 piece set and I needed one more because I have 6 bridesmaids. The seller was more than willing to send an extra grey bag to me. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Dont Hesitate!!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Great size. It's actually bigger than I'd imagined. The rose gold is so pretty with the bride silver bag. I used these with my bridesmaids proposals and I was originally planning on only using them for make up and accessories on the big day, but my "bride tribe" loved them so much we much use them as wristlet when the whole party goes out as a group. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Buy & Fast Shipping!❤
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very soft, zipper seems quite durable and not cheap like it's going to break iff after a few uses! MUCH bigger than expected, I'd definitely recommend. My bridesmaids are going to love these! I'm using them as Gift Bags at rehearsal night so they can throw their markup in there for the wedding day! Would buy again. I had to order the set plus two individuals because I have 7 girls.
customer_reviews.author: FishingBaseball86

customer_reviews.title: Big sized
customer_reviews.text: Bags are of bigger size then normal make up bag but I like it! Some bridesmaid liked it and some didn’t but hey for the price it’s pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: H. Koyama

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great value! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my bridesmaids proposal boxes. So cute! I was shocked how big they are, they can easily hold all kinds of goodies/essentials for wedding day. Only thing is I would have rather had all of them be labeled for the bridesmaids as I needed two sets and ended up with two labeled for the bride (me!).
customer_reviews.author: Sydniesweethart

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bridesmaids and was very pleased when they came. They were bigger than I had thought they would be, very pretty! I stuffed them with Kleenex, chapstick, Advil, mints, chapstick, hair ties, makeup wipes, everything I wanted and still had space left over. The girls were so happy with them and commented on how pretty the bags were. For the price and the quality, I’d highly recommend them and wouldn’t hesitate to purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.text: They came very fast, and I received an email from the seller before they were received letting me know that if I had any questions or issues to reach out. They are exactly like the picture, and will be a great gift for my bridesmaids. They are pretty big too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for gift bags for my girls going to Vegas. They are the perfect size and we used them as makeup bags after I gave them to them. It fits a lot of stuff in there. I put scrunchies, chapstick, sunglasses, a swim coverup, and some other random stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: mrswad

customer_reviews.title: BIGGER/BETTER THAN I EXPECTED!

product_meta.title: 6 Piece Set | Bride Tribe Canvas Cosmetic Makeup Clutch Gifts Bag for Bridesmaid Proposal Box & Bridesmaids Bachelorette Party Favors (Grey)
product_meta.description:
Size:6 Count| Color:Grey

Will You Join My Bride Tribe?

Your bridal party bride tribe deserve some serious matching swag 😍 and we've got the perfect DIY cosmetic makeup bag to fill with some gifts to treasure.

Getting a bridesmaid gift for your ladies is a truly special way of showing them your appreciation. They do a lot of behind-the-scenes work, some things you may not even be aware of, to make sure your big day comes together perfectly.

TEAM BRIDE TRIBE HEN PARTY: Our makeup bags are made of durable cotton canvas with heavy-duty stitching and easy-pull vintage gold zippers. Conveniently clutch-sized and non-gusseted, they fit discreetly in your carry-on luggage or purse.

Each measures 10.5'' x 7” x 2'' so they will accommodate makeup brushes and nail files as well as compacts, lipsticks, eyebrow pencils and more. They are also easy to care for and can be machine-washed and dried to maintain their like-new appearance.

Perfect for wedding decorations, bridal shower, bachelorette party supplies, bridesmaids gifts, bridal emergency kit hangover kit bags and more!
feature_bullets: 💎6 PIECE SET includes 5 Bridesmaid Makeup Bags and 1 Bride Makeup Bag. You and your girls will be traveling in style with these fun Bride Tribe Canvas Bag. Use them for every day wear or on the big day for all your necessities!

💎DIY BRIDESMAID PROPOSAL GIFTS personalized for your BFFs. For a fun gift idea, this cute clear cosmetic bag is a great bridesmaid gift in that you can put other little surprises inside as well, whether you want to add another small gift or make it into an emergency makeup kit for the day off.

💎GOLD-FOIL or BLACK SCRIPT adorns each makeup bag. Bridesmaid makeup bags are rose gold or grey, while the bride’s makeup bag is white. They will retain their pristine appearance with machine-washing and drying.
💎CONVENIENT CLUTCH SIZE is non-gusseted and fits discreetly in a purse or travel carry-on. Have all your mascaras, eyeliners and other beauty products at your fingertips when the big day arrives.

💎HEAVY-DUTY COTTON CANVAS construction is puncture resistant and machine washable. Each bag measures 10.5”W x 7”H x 2”L and features an easy-glide vintage gold zipper that holds contents securely in place.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
